```{r 040101setup, include=FALSE}
## 040101 ->- Binomial random variable X ~ B(n, p), find P(X = k). 
```


```{r echo=FALSE, results='hide'}
library(MASS)

signifDig = 4 

sol=1
while((sol<0.00001)|(sol>0.9999)){
  n <- sample(5:8, 1)
  p <- sample(3:7,1)/10
  a <- sample(2:4,1)
  sol = signif(dbinom(a, n, p), digits=signifDig)
}

## QUESTION/ANSWER GENERATION

(sol = signif(sol, signifDig))

```


```{r eval=(language == "en"), echo=FALSE, results='hide'}
question=paste0("$X$ is a binomial random variable of type $B(", n, ", ", p,").$ Find the probability $$P(X=", a," ).$$ Use  ", signifDig, " significant digits in your answer.")
  
answer=paste0("The answer is ", sol)

```


```{r eval=(language == "es"), echo=FALSE, results='hide'}

answer=paste0("La respuesta es ", sol)
```
